name: yeah.js
description: A javascript library to convert video input to its excitement score.

scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run cover
scripts.cover: NODE_ENV=test istanbul cover _mocha --report text --report html --report lcovonly -- -R spec && codecov -t 8d9fed84-f130-482a-a47d-63bde273ec81

author: Nao Ito
